item.title: ðŸš€ðŸŒš 1
item.description:
luna

tldr;
i made a browser called luna, so i can call my ex and win her back

to fully ascend to senior swe status, i have created a blog documenting my current projects, and i’m writing in the god-forsaken sentence.lower(obviously-python). luna is my journey of learning rust –notice i did not say “becoming a rustacean”. python will forever be in my heart, and until (if ever) zig changes its string primitive, it’ll remain only in my mind.
